document_data.mainbody:
Tanshiver "the Bard" Brynleaf was a human man living in Calaunt in the Vast around 1358 DR.
Despite the nickname, Tanshiver was actually a sage who specialized in folklore of human cultures and music from around the Dragon Reach. He worked from his office, known as Tanshivers Corner, on Turncobble Street.
He was also an active Harper agent.
